title: Huge 2 bedroom in fantastic downtown Skokie location!
posting_body: :-(  You still have to copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.
Huge 2 Bed in Amazing Downtown Skokie Location!
Provide your name, phone number and email address and a leasing agent will reach out

Spacious and sunny, second floor 2 Bed/1 Bath located in the heart of downtown Skokie with shopping, dining, entertainment, CTA Yellow Line, library, Village Green, North Shore Center for the Performing Arts, Skokie Farmer’s Market, Skokie Valley Trail, Oakton Park all within walking distance!
Short drive to Skokie Sports Park, Water Park, Camps, Pooch Park, Emily Oaks Nature Center, Golf Course, Tennis Parks and so much more!
Highly rated schools including Montessori School, Madison Elementary, Thomas Edison Elementary, Lincoln Junior High and Niles West High School!
-Street parking with a Skokie village permit
-Small pets OK (cats & dogs up to 40lbs, breed restrictions with $25/mo pet rent)
-Superb downtown Skokie location - steps to shops, restaurants, shopping, metra!
Photos are of exact or similar unit onsite.
-Gross monthly income should be at least 3x the rent
(There are some exceptions to these requirements, such as being a full time student and having a cosigner.)
